examples.title: Load and Validate SVG File
examples.description: Load an SVG file and perform basic validation checks
examples.user_input: Load this SVG file and check if it's valid
examples.expected_output: SVG file loaded successfully with validation results and basic information

examples.title: Convert SVG to PDF
examples.description: Convert an SVG file to high-quality PDF format
examples.user_input: Convert this SVG to PDF format for printing
examples.expected_output: SVG successfully converted to PDF with proper vector scaling

examples.title: Get SVG File Information
examples.description: Retrieve detailed metadata and statistics about an SVG file
examples.user_input: Tell me about this SVG file - size, dimensions, complexity
examples.expected_output: Comprehensive file information including dimensions, file size, and basic statistics

examples.title: Validate SVG Structure
examples.description: Perform comprehensive validation of SVG file structure
examples.user_input: Check if this SVG file is properly formatted
examples.expected_output: Validation results with any structural issues identified

examples.title: List Supported Formats
examples.description: Get list of all supported export formats
examples.user_input: What formats can I export to?
examples.expected_output: Complete list of supported vector and raster export formats

examples.title: Trace Bitmap to Vector
examples.description: Convert a scanned sketch to clean vector paths
examples.user_input: Convert this scanned drawing to vector format
examples.expected_output: Bitmap successfully traced to vector paths with optimization suggestions

examples.title: Generate QR Code
examples.description: Create a QR code for a URL
examples.user_input: Generate a QR code for my website
examples.expected_output: QR code generated and saved as SVG with scannability confirmation

examples.title: Create Mesh Gradient
examples.description: Generate a complex mesh gradient for realistic shading
examples.user_input: Create a beautiful mesh gradient for this design
examples.expected_output: Complex mesh gradient created with multiple color stops

examples.title: Convert Text to Paths
examples.description: Transform text objects into editable vector paths
examples.user_input: Convert all the text in this design to paths
examples.expected_output: Text successfully converted to editable vector paths

examples.title: AI-Powered SVG Construction
examples.description: Generate SVG from natural language description
examples.user_input: Create an SVG of a professional company logo

parameters.description: Modern geometric logo with clean lines and professional appearance

examples.expected_output: AI-generated SVG logo based on description with refinement suggestions

examples.title: Boolean Union Operation
examples.description: Combine multiple shapes using boolean union
examples.user_input: Merge these two overlapping shapes
examples.expected_output: Shapes successfully combined with clean union result

examples.title: Boolean Difference Operation
examples.description: Subtract one shape from another
examples.user_input: Cut a hole in this shape
examples.expected_output: Shape subtraction completed with precise cutout

examples.title: Path Simplification
examples.description: Reduce path complexity while preserving shape
examples.user_input: Simplify these complex paths for web performance
examples.expected_output: Paths simplified with node count reduction and performance metrics

examples.title: Path Cleaning
examples.description: Remove unnecessary elements and artifacts
examples.user_input: Clean up this imported SVG file
examples.expected_output: SVG cleaned with artifacts removed and structure optimized

examples.title: Path Combination
examples.description: Merge compatible paths into compound paths
examples.user_input: Combine these separate path segments
examples.expected_output: Paths successfully combined into unified compound paths

examples.title: Path Separation
examples.description: Break compound paths into individual elements
examples.user_input: Separate these combined paths
examples.expected_output: Compound paths broken into individual editable elements

examples.title: Convert Objects to Paths
examples.description: Transform primitive shapes to editable paths
examples.user_input: Convert all shapes to editable paths
examples.expected_output: All objects converted to fully editable BÃ©zier paths

examples.title: SVG Optimization
examples.description: Clean and optimize SVG structure
examples.user_input: Optimize this SVG for web deployment
examples.expected_output: SVG optimized with file size reduction and performance improvements

examples.title: Scour SVG Cleanup
examples.description: Remove metadata and optimize XML structure
examples.user_input: Remove all metadata from this SVG
examples.expected_output: Metadata removed and SVG structure optimized for production

examples.title: Measure Object Dimensions
examples.description: Get precise measurements of SVG objects
examples.user_input: Measure the dimensions of this logo element
examples.expected_output: Precise measurements including position, size, and bounding box

examples.title: Query Document Statistics
examples.description: Get comprehensive document information
examples.user_input: Tell me about this SVG document
examples.expected_output: Complete document statistics including dimensions, object counts, and structure

examples.title: Count Path Nodes
examples.description: Analyze path complexity by counting nodes
examples.user_input: How complex are the paths in this drawing?
examples.expected_output: Node count and complexity analysis for path optimization

examples.title: Export to DXF Format
examples.description: Convert SVG to CAD-compatible DXF format
examples.user_input: Export this design for CAD software
examples.expected_output: SVG successfully exported to DXF format for CAD applications

examples.title: Export Layers to Files
examples.description: Save each layer as a separate SVG file
examples.user_input: Split this layered design into separate files
examples.expected_output: Layers exported as individual SVG files with proper naming

examples.title: Fit Canvas to Drawing
examples.description: Resize canvas to match content bounds
examples.user_input: Resize the canvas to fit the drawing perfectly
examples.expected_output: Canvas resized to perfectly fit the drawing content

examples.title: Generate PNG Preview
examples.description: Create raster preview of vector design
examples.user_input: Create a high-quality PNG preview of this design
examples.expected_output: High-resolution PNG preview generated with specified DPI

examples.title: Create Laser Pointer Dot
examples.description: Generate animated laser pointer effect
examples.user_input: Create a cool animated laser dot
examples.expected_output: Animated green laser pointer dot created with pulsing effect

examples.title: Document Quality Analysis
examples.description: Comprehensive quality assessment of SVG document
examples.user_input: Analyze the quality of this SVG file
examples.expected_output: Detailed quality metrics including complexity, optimization potential, and performance scores

examples.title: Generate Document Statistics
examples.description: Create comprehensive document statistics
examples.user_input: Get detailed statistics about this SVG
examples.expected_output: Complete statistical analysis including object counts, path metrics, and structural information

examples.title: Validate SVG Compliance
examples.description: Check SVG against specification requirements
examples.user_input: Validate this SVG for specification compliance
examples.expected_output: Validation results with compliance status and any issues found

examples.title: List Document Objects
examples.description: Enumerate all objects in the SVG document
examples.user_input: What objects are in this SVG file?
examples.expected_output: Complete object inventory with IDs, types, and properties

examples.title: Get Document Dimensions
examples.description: Retrieve precise document size information
examples.user_input: What are the dimensions of this SVG?
examples.expected_output: Precise dimensions including canvas size, viewport, and coordinate system

examples.title: Analyze Document Structure
examples.description: Examine the hierarchical structure of the SVG
examples.user_input: Analyze the structure of this SVG document
examples.expected_output: Detailed structural analysis including hierarchy, relationships, and organization

examples.title: Check Server Status
examples.description: Get current server health and capabilities
examples.user_input: Is the Inkscape server working properly?
examples.expected_output: Server status including Inkscape availability, version, and capability information

examples.title: Get Version Information
examples.description: Retrieve server and component version details
examples.user_input: What version is the Inkscape server?
examples.expected_output: Complete version information for server and all components

examples.title: Run System Diagnostics
examples.description: Perform comprehensive system health checks
examples.user_input: Run diagnostics on the system
examples.expected_output: Diagnostic results with health status and any issues identified

examples.title: Get System Help
examples.description: Access comprehensive help and documentation
examples.user_input: Help me understand what the Inkscape server can do
examples.expected_output: Comprehensive help information including capabilities, usage, and examples

examples.title: View System Configuration
examples.description: Display current server configuration settings
examples.user_input: Show me the current configuration
examples.expected_output: Current configuration settings and available options

configuration_examples.title: Configure Inkscape Path
configuration_examples.description: Set custom path to Inkscape executable
configuration_examples.user_input: Configure the server to use Inkscape at C:\Program Files\Inkscape\bin\inkscape.exe

configuration_examples.title: Set Operation Timeout
configuration_examples.user_input: Set timeout to 120 seconds for complex operations

configuration_examples.title: Set Allowed Directories
configuration_examples.description: Restrict file access to specific directories
configuration_examples.user_input: Only allow operations in my projects folder

error_handling_examples.title: Handle File Not Found
error_handling_examples.error: FileNotFoundError: Input file does not exist
error_handling_examples.recovery: Verify file path and permissions, check if file was moved or deleted
error_handling_examples.user_action: Provide correct file path or check file location

error_handling_examples.title: Resolve Inkscape Not Found
error_handling_examples.recovery: Install Inkscape or provide explicit path in configuration
error_handling_examples.user_action: Install Inkscape or configure custom executable path

error_handling_examples.title: Fix Operation Timeout
error_handling_examples.recovery: Increase timeout setting or simplify the operation
error_handling_examples.user_action: Use simpler operation or increase timeout configuration

error_handling_examples.title: Handle Invalid SVG
error_handling_examples.recovery: Validate and repair SVG file structure
error_handling_examples.user_action: Use validation tools or repair corrupted SVG

error_handling_examples.title: Resolve Path Complexity
error_handling_examples.error: PerformanceError: Path too complex for operation
error_handling_examples.recovery: Simplify paths before applying complex operations
error_handling_examples.user_action: Use path simplification before attempting operation

error_handling_examples.title: Fix Object ID Issues
error_handling_examples.error: ValueError: Object ID not found in document
error_handling_examples.recovery: Verify object exists and ID is correct
error_handling_examples.user_action: Check object IDs in SVG or use object listing tools

error_handling_examples.title: Resolve Permission Issues
error_handling_examples.error: PermissionError: Cannot write to output location
error_handling_examples.recovery: Check write permissions and available disk space
error_handling_examples.user_action: Change output location or fix permission issues

error_handling_examples.title: Handle Memory Constraints
error_handling_examples.recovery: Process files individually or increase system memory
error_handling_examples.user_action: Break operation into smaller steps or upgrade system
